tool.name: OTB.ConcatenateImages
tool.description: Concatenate a list of images of the same size into a single multi-channel one.
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayil True output_data_out $output_data_out name OTB.ConcatenateImages il $il out $out ram $ram prefer $prefer response $response outputType_out $OutputSection_out.outputType_out transmissionMode_out $OutputSection_out.transmissionMode_out

param.name: il
param.label: The list of images to concatenate, must have the same size.
param.help: The list of images to concatenate, must have the same size. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, jpeg

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_out
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

tool.help: This application performs images channels concatenation. It reads the input image list (single or multi-channel) and generates a single multi-channel image. The channel order is the same as the list.
